column4: I've been afraid of 64bit Uboobadoo for years. Since the days of Breezy, 64bit Linux has been known to me as as "Fight With WINE/Flash/Java/Oldbinaries/Everythingelse Edition"
I did say since BREEZY, so it's been a long time of superstition. Thanks for helping me feel more confident in this planned migration. :)
I guess I could partition that during the install...
separate /usr is pretty much not supported at this point
